name: I.Q. Test
description:
Welcome to Raven's 2 Progressive Matrices — Clinical Edition!  

Are you interested in discovering your I.Q.?  🧠  Just how smart are you?  These scientifically-validated puzzles provide an accurate measurement regardless of your language or culture.

Suggestion donation amount:  Your final score, in cents!  100 I.Q. = $1.00,  so please try your best 😃

Note:  Repeated attempts and sharing answers are discouraged.  Please do not click the play button until you are ready to complete all 48 questions of the test, because you will not be allowed to play again.

This test has been made available thanks to r/cognitiveTesting.
